title: "AI Champdany Consolidated March 2022 Net Sales at Rs 8.91 crore, down 55.95% Y-o-Y"
excerpt: "Reported Consolidated quarterly numbers for AI Champdany Industries are: Net Sales at Rs 8.91 crore in March 2022 down 55.95% from Rs. 20.23 crore in March 2021. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 3.58 crore in March 2022 up 139."
